0.1.1.en: Added support for thermostats with a thermostat_mode subset.

0.2.1.en: Adjusted compatibility to Homey Pro v12.9.0.

0.3.0.en: Stability improvements, and the Matter security code will be copied to your clipboard once clicked.

0.3.1.en: Added a hint to take a screenshot if you're on the same device.

0.3.3.en: Fixed an issue where the measured temperature of a thermostat would be a factor 100 too small.

0.3.4.en: Fixed an issue where devices might lose their room in Apple Home.

0.4.0.en: Filtered already Matter and Grouped devices. Show custom device icons in the app settings.

0.4.1.en: Adjusted compatibility to Homey Pro v12.8.1.
